rooms.name: Start
rooms.description: It's dark, and cold. You're soaked through. You struggle to remember where you are, let alone how you ended up here. What were you doing again?
rooms.surroundings: There's a large door in front of you.

rooms.name: Foyer
rooms.description: You are in the dim foyer of what appears to be a mansion.
rooms.surroundings: There is a grand staircase here, as well as a couple of doors.

rooms.name: Upstairs Foyer
rooms.description: You're at the top of a staircase.
rooms.surroundings: The foyer looks huge from up here. You can't imagine anyone actually living here.

rooms.name: Upstairs Hallway One
rooms.description: A hallway stretches out ahead. It's too dark to make out what the artwork lining the walls is depicting.
rooms.surroundings: You can see three doors from here, though not especially well.

rooms.name: Study
rooms.description: A study. There are huge bookcases, that seem to be filled mostly with scientific journals, although there appear to be a few religious texts in here too.
rooms.surroundings: An old computer terminal is on in the corner. Has someone been here recently?
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemUsed: A bookshelf has moved to one side, revealing a door to the West

rooms.name: Secret Room Three
rooms.description: A small room with a podium in the center.
rooms.surroundings: A crest depicting a Lion sits neatly on the podium. It looks important.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemPickedUp: The room is completely empty. The podium stands bare.

rooms.name: Upstairs Stairway three
rooms.description: The top of a stairway. To the North is a fancy door with three indentations, and there is a much plainer door to the East.
rooms.surroundings: What could be behind the door?
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemUsed: Looks like it needs three crests to open.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A fantastically ostentatious master bedroom, with a roaring fireplace and a huge four-poster bed
rooms.surroundings: There are two doors here.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom En-Suite
rooms.surroundings: A large en-suite. There's a very expensive, but sadly empty, bottle of wine sitting by the sink. You decide you should take it with you anyway.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemPickedUp: A large en-suite. Empty wine glasses stand on the floor by the bath.

rooms.name: Upstairs stairway two
rooms.description: The top of a small staircase. It's eerily quiet here.
rooms.surroundings: There's a single door to the North.

rooms.name: Upstairs Hallway Two
rooms.description: A hallway. How big is this place?
rooms.surroundings: There are rooms in every direction here. No wonder everything's thick with dust.

rooms.name: Art Gallery
rooms.surroundings: This entire building is full of paintings, but the ones in this room are crazy. They all seem to depict demons and people being tortured. Guess they wanted to stick with a theme.

rooms.name: Hallway three (upstairs)
rooms.surroundings: There are doors in every direction, but the door to the North is boarded shut.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemUsed: There are doors in every direction.

rooms.name: Aquarium (upstairs)
rooms.surroundings: There are a number of exotic fish here. Unfortunately, they look like they've all been dead for a while. But there is a small key in the bottom of one of the tanks.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemPickedUp: The air in here is crisp, and salty. How long have the fish been dead though? What happened in this house?

rooms.name: Upstairs Library
rooms.surroundings: There are many, many books in here. There isn't time to look through them all. However, some sheet music appears to be sticking out from one of the shelves.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemPickedUp: There are many, many books in here. There isn't time to look through them all.

rooms.name: Upstairs hallway four
rooms.surroundings: It's amazing that all of these hallways look so different from one another.

rooms.name: Second bedroom
rooms.surroundings: It looks like this room has never been used. There's an en-suite to the South, and a door leading to a hallway to the North.

rooms.name: Second bathroom
rooms.description: A 'Jack and Jill' bathroom, connecting two bedrooms.
rooms.surroundings: You don't see these very often. It looks very fancy, but the water isn't running.

rooms.name: Third bedroom
rooms.surroundings: A surprisingly messy bedroom. It looks like something terrible happened in here.

rooms.name: Trophy Room
rooms.surroundings: There are various stuffed beasts adorning the walls. It's very chilling.

rooms.name: Dining Hall
rooms.surroundings: A grandfather clock is steadily ticking, its sound echoing through the room.

rooms.name: Hallway Two
rooms.surroundings: The stench in here is pretty bad. Like rotten food. There are doors in every direction, but the door to the East is locked
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemUsed: The stench in here is almost overwhelming now.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A small, grey, utility room. It feels very cold in here.
rooms.surroundings: There's a staircase that goes down a long way. There's a faint light from the bottom.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.surroundings: Flies buzz around piles of black, rotten, fruit and meat. It looks like this has been here for a long time. And it smells like it's been here even longer.

rooms.name: Freezer
rooms.surroundings: It's full of mountains of meat. And...there's a moose head on the floor.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemPickedUp: It's full of mountains of meat. Why was there a moose head in here?

rooms.name: Waste Disposal
rooms.surroundings: A room that is completely empty, except for a hatch at the back, that appears to be a waste disposal chute. Unfortunately it doesn't have a handle, and can't be opened.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemUsed: A room that is completely empty, except for a hatch at the back, that appears to be a waste disposal chute. What could be at the bottom?

rooms.name: Hallway Four
rooms.surroundings: There are a few doors leading from this hallway. The carpet appears to have been torn up in a number of places.

rooms.name: Stairway Three
rooms.surroundings: A large, wooden stairway.

rooms.name: Music Room
rooms.surroundings: A very pleasant-looking music room, with a grand piano in the center.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemUsed: A wall has moved, revealing a hidden room behind it.

rooms.name: Hallway Five
rooms.surroundings: There seem to be a lot of hallways in this place.

rooms.name: Gym
rooms.surroundings: There is a piece of paper on the floor.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemPickedUp: This is nicer than any gym I've ever been to.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool
rooms.surroundings: This really is incredible. The smell of chlorine fills the air, and the warmth of the pool can be felt against your skin.

rooms.name: Showers
rooms.surroundings: There are a row of showers here, as you'd find in a public simming pool. I wonder how many people live here?

rooms.name: Secret Room One
rooms.surroundings: A room that is completely empty, save for a stone podium with a crest on top of it.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemPickedUp: The room is completely empty, except for the podium in the middle, where you found a crest.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.surroundings: You get a strange feeling. Are you alone? It's quiet, but this place is so big, it's hard to be sure.

rooms.name: Statue Room
rooms.surroundings: One of them appears to have been beheaded.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemUsed: At least it isn't mannequins, but statues aren't a lot better. One of the statues has moved aside, revealing a hidden doorway.

rooms.name: Secret room two
rooms.surroundings: The room is cold, and empty, except for a podium in the middle. On it, sits a crest.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemPickedUp: An empty room, except for a lonely looking concrete podium in the middle.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.surroundings: This hallway is quite large. There's a locked door to the North with a plaque that reads "Servants' Quarters".
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemUsed: This hallway is quite large. The door to the servants' quarters is unlocked.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.surroundings: The garage is empty, apart from a few tools. You think a crowbar could come in handy. Besides, you're not really sure what the rest of these tools are.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemPickedUp: The garage is empty, apart from a few tools. You're not entirely sure what they're for.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.surroundings: It's actually pretty nice in here. For some reason, the head of a statue is sitting on a table in here.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemPickedUp: It's actually pretty nice in here. But who were these people serving?

rooms.name: Servants' Bathroom
rooms.surroundings: There's not a lot to see in here.

rooms.name: Stairway Two
rooms.surroundings: A sturdy-looking staircase sits in a dimly-lit room.

rooms.name: Basement Stairway
rooms.surroundings: It's cold. And dark.

rooms.name: Basement Storage
rooms.surroundings: There are a few crates down here. Probably nothing too important in them though. There's a door to the North, but it doesn't seem to open from this side.

rooms.name: Basement Storage two
rooms.surroundings: There's a metal handle on the ground.

rooms.name: Item Room
rooms.surroundings: Amongst the boxes lies a small key.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemPickedUp: There's nothing interesting in here any more.

rooms.name: Waste disposal
rooms.surroundings: The ground is covered in a slimy, horrible mess. There is a door to the East.

rooms.name: Wine Cellar
rooms.surroundings: A gigantic wine cellar. Amazingly, every space is filled, except for one.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemUsed: A gigantic wine cellar. One of the racks has moved, revealing a hidden doorway.

rooms.name: Lab Entrance
rooms.description: An entrance...to a laboratory? This is very unusual. There appears to be an entrance to a laboratory here! Unfortunately, as you enter, you succumb to a strange feeling. You're losing conciousness. As you fall to your knees, you can almost make out a voice nearby...
rooms.surroundings: To be continued.
